positive_examples: This is an example of nitric acid.
The nitric acid demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed nitric acid in this context.
A typical case of nitric acid would involve these features.
The concept of nitric acid applies here.
A highly corrosive mineral acid used in fertilizer production, metal etching, and explosive manufacturing.
negative_examples: This is an example of sulfuric acid, not nitric acid.
This represents chemical acid in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: SulfuricAcid, or other types of ChemicalAcid

definition: A highly corrosive strong acid (HNO3) used in fertilizer production and chemical synthesis.
